name: Brian Nova
position: Product Lead at Quantum Groove Systems
content: Turned a chaotic backlog into a clear, reliable roadmap. Features shipped on time, bugs stayed quiet, and somehow we all felt like we knew what we were doing.

name: Jordan Vega
content: We asked for a bug fix; he upgraded the whole system instead. Smooth, fast, and somehow less stressful than it has any right to be.

name: Casey Monroe
content: I gave him scattered ideas and vague goals—he returned something coherent, usable, and actually enjoyable. Not sure if it’s skill or sorcery.

name: Samantha Cruz
content: Hired for a prototype, got a production-ready app. Organized, efficient, and just the right amount of creative flair.

name: Drew Kimura
content: Steady under pressure, clear communicator, and somehow predicts blockers before they happen. Makes everyone else look like they’re improvising.
